mapper.insert: insert file(original_name, server_name, path, extension, message_id,file_size) values (#{original_name}, #{server_name}, #{path}, #{extension}, #{message_id}, #{file_size})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM FILE F JOIN MESSAGE M ON F.MESSAGE_ID = M.ID WHERE M.CHANNEL_ID = #{CHANNEL_ID} AND M.DELETE_YN = 'N'
